---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

### PR summary [db51065db7](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16680/commits/db51065db7450cf73d67d83669ef00167c334ed3)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ CostructuredArrow.initial_proj_of_isCofiltered`
`+ Functor.final_diag_of_isFiltered`
`+ Functor.initial_diag_of_isFiltered`
`+ StructuredArrow.final_proj_of_isFiltered`
`- Functor.diag_final_of_isFiltered`
`- Functor.diag_initial_of_isFiltered`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

:v: javra can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10829350182/job/30046717226)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10829350182/job/30046717510)
The docstring neees to be dualized.

```suggestion
/-- The functor `StructuredArrow.proj : StructuredArrow Y T ⥤ C` is final if `T : C ⥤ D` is final
```

```suggestion
instance StructuredArrow.final_proj_of_isFiltered [IsFiltered C]
```
It's not so important to perfectly adhere to the naming convention because this is an instance, but it doesn't hurt either. The instance `Functor.diag_final_of_isFiltered` above should also be called `Functor.final_diag_of_isFiltered`.

It turns out that we can generalize universes here by going through `IsConnected` instead of `IsFiltered`. The following proof works without constraining the universe of the morphisms of `D`:
```lean
  refine ⟨fun X => ?_⟩
  rw [isConnected_iff_of_equivalence (ofStructuredArrowProjEquivalence T Y X)]
  exact (final_comp (Under.forget X) T).out 
```
So I think this theorem should be moved out of the `LocallySmall` section.

It might be possible that this can be done for other theorems in this section, I haven't checked.

```suggestion
instance StructuredArrow.final_proj_of_isFiltered [IsFilteredOrEmpty C]
```
or
```suggestion
instance StructuredArrow.final_proj_of_isFilteredOrEmpty [IsFilteredOrEmpty C]
```
Keeping quiet about the `OrEmpty` part seems more in line with the rest of the file

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(CategoryTheory/Filtered): finality and initiality of projections on (co)structured arrow cats
